title: Support UCS2 Python
body_html:
on linux, python-2.7, cuda-7.5, installed using pip.

import torch it gives the error:

>>> import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/jingleng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 45, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /home/jingleng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so: undefined symbol: PyUnicodeUCS4_AsUTF8String

import torch it gives the error:

ImportError: /home/jingleng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so: undefined symbol: PyUnicodeUCS4_AsUTF8String
body:
on linux, python-2.7, cuda-7.5, installed using pip. 

`import torch` it gives the error: 
```
>>> import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/jingleng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 45, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /home/jingleng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so: undefined symbol: PyUnicodeUCS4_AsUTF8String
```
